# setData(_:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces the entire contents of the receiver with the contents of another data object.

## Declaration

```swift
func setData(_ data: Data)
```

## Parameters

- **data**: The data object whose content replaces that of the receiver.

## Discussion

As part of its implementation, this method calls [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSMutableData/replaceBytes(in:withBytes:)].

## Modifying Bytes

- **replaceBytes(in:withBytes:)**: Replaces with a given set of bytes a given range within the contents of the receiver.
- **replaceBytes(in:withBytes:length:)**: Replaces with a given set of bytes a given range within the contents of the receiver.
- **resetBytes(in:)**: Replaces with zeroes the contents of the receiver in a given range.
